DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine 6-month overall survival rate patient locally advance metastatic adenocarcinoma pancreas treat gemcitabine ISIS 2503 . II . Determine response rate patient treat regimen . III . Assess toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 ISIS 2503 IV continuously day 1-14 . Treatment continue every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year every 6 month 4 year .
